description:
Celebrate DOOMâ€™s 25th anniversary with the  re-release of the original DOOM (1993). First released in 1993, DOOM introduced millions of gamers to the fast-paced, white-knuckle, demon-slaying action the franchise is known for.

Experience the classic demon-blasting fun that popularized the genre home or on-the-go.

DOOM (1993) includes:
 - The expansion, Episode IV: Thy Flesh Consumed, with 9 additional action-packed levels 
- Local 4 player deathmatch
- Local 4 player co-op
name: DOOM (1993)
